title: The random black champ screen problem
body: I'm about to get a ban over it its been happening over last two patches. last patch would drop you out but this time just won't let you load straight up. Be careful out there today. Happened to me twice last night

replies.body: Just wish I could have que timers removed but I know that's not going to happen

LoL client is broken just a struggle to get into a game and even then getting kernel stop working just want to play some LoL and chill on a sunday this is bullshit was working perfectly fine last night.

Nope that was just luck for one custom match so now another problem when going back into norms. SERIOUSLY CAN I GET A BLOODY RIOT REPLY? It's almost impossible to send in a ticket for this stuff now. And I'm on the verge of ban just from this one problem occurring over last two patches. Have done everything possible to try and fix problem that I can do on my own now.
Okay so I found the fix which was do one of every fix. Or I just got lucky who knows.... This is really something though

Would absolutely love to know if someone has found a fix for this. Since there's not really an error ticket anymore and you have to fill out 1 Million page long essay/questionaire to get a ticket in these days

Haven't been able to join into a game for a long time now. Can't even start a custom match with all easy bots. Have repaired, run as admin, turned off all security, re-patched, restarted and done anything under the sun that you usually try. Maybe it's time to turn leaver buster back off for a little? I'm lucky to not have received a ban over this occurring over two patches.
